Index entries for sequences related to Recamán's sequence
prog: (Haskell)import Data.Set (Set, singleton, notMember, insert)a057165 n = a057165_list !! na057165_list = r (singleton 0) 1 0 where   r :: Set Integer -> Integer -> Integer -> [Integer]   r s n x = if x > n && (x - n) `notMember` s                then r (insert (x-n) s) (n+1) (x-n)                else n : r (insert (x+n) s) (n+1) (x+n)-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Mar 17 2011
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Sep 14 2000
